src:
Dua Ganda Putra Melaju, Ini Hasil Lengkap Hari Kedua Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019
06 Nov 2019, 19:45 by Danang Sundoro



Dua Ganda Putra Melaju, Ini Hasil Lengkap Hari Kedua Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019



Dua Ganda Putra Melaju, Ini Hasil Lengkap Hari Kedua Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019


KBRN, Fuzhou : Dua pasangan ganda putra Indonesia melaju ke babak kedua turnamen Fuzhou China Open 2019 di Haixia, Olympic Sports Center, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam.Tiket pertama diraih The Daddies, pasangan putra Indonesia Hendra Setiawan/Mohammad Ahsan yang mampu menundukkan wakil Taiwan, Wang Chi-Lin/Lee Yang, tiga game dengan skor 27-25, 22-24, 21-17. BACA JUGA : Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019: Gresyia/Rahayu Terhenti, Jojo MelajuPertarungan kedua ganda putra ini sudah berlangsung sengit dari game pertama. Hendra/Ahsan yang sudah unggul game point 20-19, masih belum bisa menyelesaikan permainan hingga kedudukan imbang 25-25. Selanjutnya di game kedua dan ketiga, pertandingan masih berlangsung ramai, namun Hendra/Ahsan masih memegang kendali. “Kami sudah menyangka akan ramai kalau ketemu mereka, memang selalu nggak mudah kalau melawan mereka. Di game kedua kami terlalu banyak kasih bola-bola pelan, mereka sudah antisipasi dan kami balik tertekan,” ujar Hendra usai laga dalam keterangan tertulis dari PP.PBSI kepada Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Rabu (6/11/2019).“Di game ketiga, kami fokus di pukulan pembukaan, dan kami usahakan turunkan bola supaya dapat kesempatan untuk menyerang,” ujar Hendra ketika ditanya kunci kemenangan di game penentu. BACA JUGA : Fuzhou China Open 2019, Jordan/Melati Melaju ke Babak Kedua
Pada babak kedua, Hendra/Ahsan akan berjumpa dengan wakil tuan rumah, Zhang Nan/Ou Xuan Yi. “Untuk besok, kami harus main lebih sabar, apalagi bolanya agak lambat,” tutur Hendra melihat sang lawan, Kamis (7/11/2019).
BACA JUGA : Tommy Terhenti di Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019
Sementara itu, tiket kedua ganda putra merah putih ke babak kedua dipersembahkan pasangan Fajar Alfian/Muhammad Rian Ardianto yang menang atas wakil Taiwan  Liao Min Chun/Su Ching Heng dengan skor akhir 21-12, 21-12.
text:
Two Doubles Men Drove, This Is Complete Results Second Day Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019
06 Nov 2019, 19:45 by Danang Sundoro



Two Doubles Men Drove, This Is Complete Results Second Day Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019



Two Doubles Men Drove, This Is Complete Results Second Day Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019


KBRN, Fuzhou: Two Indonesian men's doubles pairs advanced to the second round of the 2019 China Open Fuzhou tournament at Haixia, Olympic Sports Center, Wednesday (11/06/2019) night. The first ticket was won by The Daddies, Indonesian male couple Hendra Setiawan / Mohammad Ahsan who able to beat the representative of Taiwan, Wang Chi-Lin / Lee Yang, three games with a score of 27-25, 22-24, 21-17. READ ALSO: Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Gresia / Rahayu Stalled, Jojo Goes Forward The men's doubles second battle has been fierce since the first game. Hendra / Ahsan who have excelled game point 20-19, still could not finish the game until 25-25. Furthermore, in the second and third games, the match was still going on, but Hendra / Ahsan was still in control. "We had expected that it would be crowded if we met them, it is always not easy to fight them. In the second game we love too many slow balls, they have anticipated it and we are under pressure, "Hendra said after the match in a written statement from PP.PBSI to Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Wednesday (11/06/2019)." In the third game, we focus on the opening punch, and we try to put down the ball so we have a chance to attack, "Hendra said when asked the key to victory in the deciding game. READ ALSO: Fuzhou China Open 2019, Jordan / Melati Drove to the Second Round
In the second half, Hendra / Ahsan will meet with the host representative, Zhang Nan / Ou Xuan Yi. "For tomorrow, we must play more patiently, moreover the ball is a bit slow," Hendra said looking at the opponent, Thursday (11/07/2019).
READ ALSO: Tommy Stopped at Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019
Meanwhile, the second ticket for the men's doubles and reds to the second round was presented by Fajar Alfian / Muhammad Rian Ardianto who won over Taiwan representative Liao Min Chun / Su Ching Heng with a final score of 21-12, 21-12.
